Refund Policy

We are committed to your satisfaction. Please review our refund policy below.

1. Refund Eligibility

Psychology Zone offers refunds under the following conditions:

  • Refunds are available for cancelled sessions up to 24 hours before the scheduled appointment time
  • If a therapist cancels a session without valid reason, you will receive a full refund or credit for a rescheduled session
  • Technical issues preventing the session from occurring qualify for a full refund or rescheduling
  • Payment disputes must be raised within 7 days of the transaction

2. Refund Process

To request a refund, please follow these steps:

  • Contact us at info@psychologyzone.in or +91 89689 00002
  • Provide your session details, booking reference, and reason for refund request
  • Include any supporting documentation if applicable
  • Our team will review your request within 5-7 business days
  • If approved, refunds will be processed to your original payment method within 10-15 business days

3. Non-Refundable Scenarios

The following situations are generally non-refundable:

  • Refunds cannot be issued if you cancel within 24 hours of a scheduled session
  • No-shows without prior notification are non-refundable
  • Sessions already completed are non-refundable
  • Client-initiated cancellations with less than 24 hours notice are subject to retention of payment

4. Session Credits & Rescheduling

Instead of a refund, you may prefer:

  • Rescheduling your session to another date and time
  • Receiving a credit towards future sessions
  • Converting your payment into session credits with valid up to 3 months

5. Payment Method & Processing

Refunds will be processed to the original payment method used for the transaction. Depending on your bank or payment provider, it may take 5-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account. We are not responsible for delays caused by your financial institution.

6. Package Deals & Discounts

If you have purchased a package or used promotional codes:

  • Only unused portions of packages are eligible for refund
  • Discounted packages have limited refund eligibility (contact us for details)
  • Promotional credits are non-transferable and non-refundable

7. Dispute Resolution

If you believe you are entitled to a refund and your request is denied:

  • You may request a formal review by emailing us with detailed documentation
  • We will respond with a detailed explanation within 10 business days
  • You may escalate the matter for independent review if you remain unsatisfied

8. Money-Back Guarantee

Psychology Zone offers a satisfaction guarantee. If you are not satisfied with your first session and provide feedback within 24 hours, we will either:

  • Offer you a full refund, or
  • Match you with a different therapist at no additional cost

9. Cancellation by Psychology Zone

If we cancel a session:

  • We will provide at least 48 hours' notice whenever possible
  • You will receive a full refund or credit for a rescheduled session
  • We will provide alternative time slots or refund the payment immediately

10. Contact Us for Refund Inquiries

Email: info@psychologyzone.in

Phone: +91 89689 00002

Address: Arjun Singh Bajwa 20, Sector 8A, Chandigarh, India

Hours: Monday - Sunday, 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM IST

11. Policy Changes

Psychology Zone reserves the right to modify this Refund Policy at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the website. Continued use of our services following policy updates constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

Last Modified: December 2024
